description: The Scourge of the Underworld is the name of a series of fictional characters that have appeared in various series set in the Marvel Comics universe.Writer/editor Mark Gruenwald originally created the Scourge in 1985 as a plot device intended to thin the criminal population of the Marvel Universe, in particular eliminating those supervillain characters he deemed to be too minor, redundant, or ill-conceived.
name: Scourge of the Underworld
